price: Nasi tulipo usikia uwongofu tuliuamini. Basi mwenye kumuamini Mola wake Mlezi basi haogopi kupunjwa wala kudhulumiwa.
arabic: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعۡنَا ٱلۡهُدَىٰٓ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦۖ فَمَن يُؤۡمِنۢ بِرَبِّهِۦ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخۡسٗا وَلَا رَهَقٗا
footnotes: Na hakika sisi tulipo isikia Qur'ani tuliiamini. Na mwenye kumuamini Mola wake Mlezi basi hachelei kupunguziwa chochote katika mema yake, wala kudhulumiwa kwa kuzidishiwa maovu yake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-annā lammā samiʿ'nā al-hudā āmannā bihi faman yu'min birabbihi falā yakhāfu bakhsan walā rahaqan
